main event: A civilian sighted an unidentified flying object in Akron, Ohio on February 22, 1961.
interesting points: The object was observed for 30 seconds from close proximity within 600 feet of the observer., The sighting occurred during nighttime at 11:10 PM., The observer described the sound of the object as fuzzy or hissing., The object showed unpredictable movements, including sudden appearances and disappearances., The observer initially thought it might have been a shooting star due to its low altitude and slow motion.
